
[[File:ASSC promo logo.jpg|thumb|An image used to announce the collaboration.]]

'''{{w|Anti Social Social Club|AntiSocialSocialClub}}''' (also referred to as '''ASSC''') is a clothing company that collaborated with [[Mojang Studios]] on a limited-time ''[[Minecraft]]''-themed collection. The collection was revealed on October 15, 2025 and released on October 18, 2025.<ref>{{Cite Instagram|opposuits|DP1itBsEYZc|MINECRAFT X ASSC<br>Worldwide Release Online<br><br>Saturday 10/18:<br>antisocialsocialclub.com 8AM PST<br>antisocialsocialclub.co.uk 11AM BST<br><br>Sunday 10/19:<br>antisocialsocialclub.jp 12AM JST|October 15, 2025}}</ref> The collaboration was featured in the official ''Minecraft'' booth at the {{Wikipedia|TwitchCon}} in {{w|San Diego}} from October 19 to October 20.<ref>{{Cite Instagram|minecraft|DP984S2EuO|Spear, nautilus, zombie horse, @antisocialsocialclub and more. Check out our booth @twitchcon today and tomorrow.|October 19, 2025}}</ref>
